document_data.name: Nyriana Greenglade
document_data.mainbody: riana had long, straight gray hair, gray eyes, and light skin. She wore a neat suit of [[chain mail]] decorated with the symbology of Amaunator.
document_data.Description: Nyriana had long, straight gray hair, gray eyes, and light skin. She wore a neat suit of [[chain mail]] decorated with the symbology of Amaunator.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, Nyriana joined the [[Elves of Cormanthor]] at their [[Myth Drannor outskirts camp|forward camp]] outside the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]]. Nyriana sought to provide healing and respite for those who arrived at the camp and used it as a base for expeditions into the dangerous ruins, and set up a shrine to Amaunator in a [[tent]].
